author: fwyzard
body:
Various updates to the ROCm package for CMSSW:
  - remove the debuginfo files, that are not used
  - drop support for Radoen Pro W6800 GPUs (`gfx1030`)
  - include additional libraries and tool in the ROCm package

The extra libraries are needed to build UCX and PyTorch with ROCm support.
title: ROCm: various updates
